backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing video management system with authorization, blob storage, user profiles, video CRUD operations, engagement tracking, and admin-only functions for adding videos and viewing analytics.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of the header logo image in the Layout component with a neon green arrow design showing 'LEARNING VIDEOS' text.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, utilities, and configuration for the Learning Videos application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system with funky vibrant chart colors (hot pink, lime green, orange, purple, cyan) for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Learning Videos' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for video list, admin panel, and admin dashboard, wrapped in ThemeProvider with ProfileSetupModal and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-screen access denied component with shield icon and navigation button for unauthorized users attempting to access admin-only pages.
Card-based table component displaying user engagement records with filtering options by video/user and colorful status badges for watched, watch later, and not interested.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with sticky header containing neon green arrow logo image at /assets/1771767120748.png, responsive navigation menu with admin links, mobile menu toggle, login button, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity hook to handle login/logout with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it. Prevents closing until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/StatusButton.tsx: Reusable button component with three visual variants (watched, later, skip) that shows a checkmark when selected and applies variant-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/ThumbnailPreview: Displays a video thumbnail preview in a card with fallback UI showing an ImageOff icon when no thumbnail is available.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component displaying video information with thumbnail, title, date badge, and three status buttons (watched, watch later, not interested) that update user video status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state changes and initializing access control with admin token from URL params.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend API calls including user profile, video management, video status tracking, and admin dashboard data fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Hook that fetches and returns the current user's role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays engagement metrics (total videos, total engagements) and an engagement table showing which users watched which videos. Includes role-based access control and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page for adding new videos with URL input, automatic thumbnail generation from YouTube/Instagram links, and title entry. Includes form validation and success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/VideoList.tsx: Main video feed page that displays all videos in a scrollable list with authentication check. Shows loading states, error handling, and empty state when no videos exist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/src/utils/videoUrlParser.ts: Utility functions to extract video IDs from YouTube and Instagram Reel URLs, generate YouTube thumbnail URLs, and validate video URL formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with chart colors, sidebar colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the app's purpose (learning video engagement tracker), architectural notes, and completed features including admin authentication, video management, status tracking, and dashboard views.
